title: SDKA International Retains KCSA Strategic Communications as
text:
DUBAI , UAE, Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --  SDKA International , a global resources firm dedicated to the financing, production, refining, processing, transportation, storage and supply of a broad range of commodities, announces KCSA Strategic Communications, a leading New York -based communications firm, will lead the Company's public relations program. KCSA will deploy a wide-reaching outreach campaign to increase awareness of SDKA International in the North American market. Leveraging more than 40 years of public relations experience, KCSA will establish SDKA executives as thought leaders in the mining, commodity and financial services spaces as well as lay the groundwork for future additions to the firm's current product offerings. KCSA Managing Partner, Lewis Goldberg , will lead the efforts and provide strategic counsel on public relations matters.
"SDKA is well-known in the Middle East and Europe , but has yet to develop the same level of brand awareness in North America . We needed a partner that could quickly understand a complex business and effectively communicate our value proposition to a wide variety of audiences. We found that partner in KCSA Strategic Communications," noted SDKA International CEO, Christopher Kelly , "The KCSA team quickly helped us refine our message, and begin to telling our story to key stakeholders. They are responsive, intelligent and committed."
"The global commodities markets are ripe for disruption, and the SDKA International team has a plan to bring unprecedented transparency and access to the precious metal, gem and oil and gas industries," said KCSA Strategic Communications, Lewis Goldberg , Managing Partner. " Gurpreet Singh Rai and Chris Kelly have a proven track record in the space and have built a team that will fundamentally change the way investors can participate in the commodity value chain."
About SDKA International
SDKA International is a multinational company based in the UAE with offices in New York , Dubai , Johannesburg and Abu Dhabi . The firm has a global presence in the financing, production, refining, processing, transportation, storage and supply of a broad range of commodities. SDKA International's mission is to provide a reliable and competitive service to its partners and suppliers. For more information on SDKA International visit  www.sdkainternational.com .
About KCSA Strategic Communications
KCSA is a fully integrated communications agency specializing in public relations, investor relations and marketing with expertise in financial and professional services, technology, healthcare, media, energy and public services companies. Since 1969, the firm has demonstrated strategic thinking and program execution that drives results for its clients in the ever-changing communications and digital landscape. The firm's clients are its best references. For more information, please visit www.kcsa.com .
